question: i get these spells every couple of months where i feel really faint then my hearing goesfunny, as long as i sit down i dont faint , but then i be sick and then have a terrible headache that i have to lie down? as i say this happens every now and then and the last time i had eaten 3 hours b4 this and had a small snack. im also hungry alot and get headaches quite a few times a month. i have been docs and he said my diabetes test was all clear and im not diabetic and my ecg was ok too. why does this keep happening then?
title: feel faint,then sick then headache
